text: Legislative elections were held in Mayotte on 9 and 16 March 2008 as part of the 2008 French municipal elections. The Union for a Popular Movement emerged as the largest party, winning eight of the nineteen seats.The World Factbook Central Intelligence Agency, 2010, p419 ==Results== {| class=wikitable style=text-align:right !Party !Seats |- |align=left|Union for a Popular Movement||8 |- |align=left|Miscellaneous Right||4 |- |align=left|Citizen and Republican Movement||1 |- |align=left|Democratic Movement||1 |- |align=left|Miscellaneous Left||1 |- |align=left|Independents||4 |- |align=left|Total||19 |- |align=left colspan=4|Source: CIA |} ==References== Category:2008 in Mayotte Category:Elections in Mayotte Mayotte Category:March 2008 events in Africa
title: 2008 Mahoran legislative election
